means: <书>由两部分组成的，有两部分的

sentence.Network_en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentence.Network_en: The value of the new Cordinate Systems and surfaces is twofold.
sentence.Network_cn: 新坐标系和坐标曲面的价值是双重的.

entry.def: You can use twofold to introduce a topic that has two equally important parts.

example.ex: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
example.tran: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

means.word_mean: 1. having more than one decidedly dissimilar aspects or qualities;

sentences.sentence: "a double (or dual) role for an actor"
"the office of a clergyman is twofold; public preaching and private influence"- R.W.Emerson
"every episode has its double and treble meaning"-Frederick Harrison
